fields.name: BackupStorageRedundancies
fields.description: The properties of available backup storage redundancies.

fields.name: IsResidencyRestricted
fields.description: Flag indicating whether the location is residency sensitive.

fields.name: IsSubscriptionRegionAccessAllowedForAz
fields.description: Flag indicating whether the subscription have access in region for Availability Zones(Az).

fields.name: IsSubscriptionRegionAccessAllowedForRegular
fields.description: Flag indicating whether the subscription have access in region for Non-Availability Zones.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: Enum to indicate current buildout status of the region.

fields.name: SupportsAvailabilityZone
fields.description: Flag indicating whether the location supports availability zones or not.
